item.description:
Running the first of three introductory scenarios in the Pathfinder Organized Play campaign.
Pregenerated Characters will be provided - if players would like to create their own PC, they must be Pathfinder Society legal.
Completion of the scenario provides a Chronicle Sheet, a record of play which provides XP.
I can support a table of 4-6
If interested, or you have any questions, please feel free to send me an email.
item.name: Pathfinder Society at The Temple
